title: Dining Room
description: The rectangular layout of the TV and dining area creates a seamless flow from the kitchen to the 4-meter couch overlooking the city. A beautifully designed wall adds a touch of elegance, making it an ideal space for entertainment.

title: Kitchen
description: Inspired by studio McGee kitchens, the modern yet rustic kitchen boasts a large island, round table, pantry, and balcony access. It's a culinary artist's paradise.
